lynette.name: Lynette Vaporize Team #1
lynette.description: Lynette is a Support in the team. The Vapourization DMG of whole team is maximized by Lynette. Xiangling and Bennett allow the team to trigger vapourization all the time.

characters.description: Childe is the main DPS, his DMG is amplified by the Vaporization in this team.
Xiangling’s Elemental Burst provides huge amount of DMG and continuous Pyro element attachment for Childe to trigger Vaporization.
Best 4 Stars WeaponFavonius Sword
Bennett’s Elemental Burst provides huge ATK buff and healing to other members.

lynette.name: Lynette Overload Team
lynette.description: Lynette is a Support in the team. The Electro DMG of whole team is maximized by Kujou Sara(C6)’s Electro CRIT DMG Bonus.  Raiden Shogun and Kujou Sara’s Electro DMG reacts with Pyro attachment from Bennett to trigger Overload.

characters.description: Raiden Shogun is the main DPS in the team. The DMG of Elemental Burst depends on the energy consumed by team members using their Elemental Burst. Xiangling and Kujou Sara’s Elemental Bursts require 80 energy, which makes them best teammates of Raiden Shogun. Raiden Shogun can boost Energy Recharge of their teammates by using Elemental Burst, and also increase DMG of teammates’ Elemental Burst by using Elemental Skill. This makes Raiden Shogun a all-rounded Main DPS. Raiden Shogun’s Electro DMG reacts with Pyro attachment from Xiangling to trigger Overload.

Kujou Sara can provide ATK Bonus to teammates. And C6 Kujou Sara’s Elemental Burst can boost CRIT DMG of Electro DMG of Raiden Shogun and Beidou. The high energy consumption of Elemental Burst maximizes Elemental Burst DMG of Raiden Shogun.
Best 4 Stars WeaponFavonius Sword
Bennett’s Elemental Burst provides huge ATK buff and healing to other members.

lynette.name: Lynette Permafrost Team #2
lynette.description: Lynette is a Support in the team. Ayaka deals DMG by her Elemental Burst and Skill, and her Cyro dmg reacts with Hydro attachment from Kokomi to trigger freezing.

characters.description: Ayaka’s Elemental Burst deals high DMG and provides Cryo attachment for triggering Freezing.
Shenhe provides ATK Bonus to Ayaka and reduces Cryo RES of enemies.

Kokomi is the Support/Healer in the team. The Elemental Skill’s attacks trigger Hydro every two seconds, and each damage triggers the Tenacity of the Millelith(4).This makes Ayaka and Ganyu can constantly freeze the enemy in most of the fight time.
Best 4 Stars WeaponFavonius Sword

lynette.name: Lynette Permafrost Team #3
lynette.description: Lynette is a Support in the team. Ayaka deals DMG by her Elemental Burst and Skill, and her Cyro dmg reacts with Hydro attachment from Kokomi to trigger freezing.

characters.description: Ayaka’s Elemental Burst deals high DMG and provides Cryo attachment for triggering Freezing.

The elemental particles generation from Rosaria Elemental Skill and Favonius Lance only 6s CD, make sure giving enough elemental charge for Ayaka and Kokomi.Rosaria’s Cryo attachment reacts with Kokomi’s Hydro DMG to trigger Freezing.

Kokomi is the Support/Healer in the team. The Elemental Skill’s attacks trigger Hydro every two seconds, and each damage triggers the Tenacity of the Millelith(4).This makes Ayaka and Rosaria can constantly freeze the enemy in most of the fight time.
Best 4 Stars WeaponFavonius Sword

lynette.name: Lynette Vaporize #2 Team
lynette.description: Lynette is a Support in the team.The Vapourization DMG of whole team is maximized by Lynette.

characters.description: Hu Tao is the main DPS, her DMG is amplified by the Vaporization in this team.

Yelan is the Sub DPS in this team. Yelan can provide continuous Hydro attack off-field which reacts with the Pyro element on enemies applied by Hu Tao. Yelan’s Elemental Burst can also increase DMG of Hu Tao via her passive talent.
Best 4 Stars WeaponFavonius Sword
Zhongli’s shield provides safe environment for team members, and increase ATK of whole team by using full set of Tenacity of the Millelith.

lynette.name: Lynette Vaporize Team #3
lynette.description: Lynette is Support in the team. The Vapourization DMG of whole team is maximized by Lynette. Nahida and Bennett allow the team to trigger burning all the time.

characters.description: Tartaglia is the main DPS, his DMG is amplified by the Vaporization in this team.

Nahida mainly deals DMG by her Elemental Skill, which connects 8 enemies at maximum and deals Dendro DMG to them while triggering elemental reactions. The Elemental Burst of Nahida buffs her Elemental Skill depends on the Element of her teammates.
Best 4 Stars WeaponFavonius Sword
Bennett’s Elemental Burst provides huge ATK buff and healing to other members.

characters.description: Raiden Shogun is the main DPS in the team. The DMG of Elemental Burst depends on the energy consumed by team members using their Elemental Burst. Yae Miko’s Elemental Bursts require 90 energy, which makes them best teammates of Raiden Shogun. Raiden Shogun can boost Energy Recharge of their teammates by using Elemental Burst, and also increase DMG of teammates’ Elemental Burst by using Elemental Skill. This makes Raiden Shogun a all-rounded Main DPS.
Yae’s Elemental Skill provide continuous Electro attachment off-field. When C4, it provides Electro DMG buff to teammates.
Kazuha can assist the team by grouping enemies together, applying crowd control, provide DMG buff to teammates and reduce Elemental Resistance of enemies.
Bennett’s Elemental Burst provides huge ATK buff and healing to other members.

thoma.name: Thoma Burgeon Team
thoma.description: Thoma is the Shiled/Supprot in the team. Dendro Element from Nahida reacts with Hydro Element from Kokomi and Yelan to trigger Bloom which produces Dendro Cores. When Thoma use his Elemental Burst the active character’s Normal Attacks will dealing AoE Pyro DMG and activate the cores to trigger Burgeon .

characters.description: Ayato is the Main DPS in this team.With Thoma’s shield in effect, Ayato’s Normal Attacks will dealing AoE Pyro DMG and activate the cores to trigger Burgeon .
Yelan is the Sub DPS in this team. Yelan can provide continuous Hydro attack off-field which reacts with Dendro element from Nahida to trigger Blooming which produces cores.

Nahida mainly deals DMG by her Elemental Skill, which connects 8 enemies at maximum and deals Dendro DMG to them while triggering elemental reactions. The Elemental Burst of Nahida buffs her Elemental Skill depends on the Element of her teammates.  As there are two Hydro and one Pyro Characters in this team, the duration of her Elemental Burst is increased.

Thoma’s shield provides safe environment for team members. Another important role of Thoma is triggering Burgeon. The Elemental Burst of Thoma can make the active characters dealing an extra Pyro DMG durin attacking, which is the trigger of Burgeon.While at C6, when the shield is obtained or refreshed, the DMG dealt by Ayato’s Normal Attacks is increased by 15% .

characters.description: Hu Tao is the main DPS, her DMG is amplified by the Vaporization in this team.
Xingqiu’s Elemental Burst can attach Hydro element to enemies continuously, and so react with Yoimiya’s Pyro DMG to trigger Vaporization.
Chongyun’s Elemental Skill(requires C2) lower CDs of Elemental Burst. And He provides Cyro DMG at backstage.
Thoma’s shield provides safe environment for team members.

thoma.name: Thoma Superconduct Team #1
thoma.tier: Thoma is the Support in the team. Thoma’s Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst is maximized by Stacking Max HP and this help to Maximize the team’s survivability.

characters.description: Eula’s Elemental Burst is the core of this team, which is maximized under the effect of Superconduct, DMG Bonus from Raiden Shogun’s Elemental Skill and Set Bonus of Tenacity of the Millelith from Zhongli.

Raiden Shogun is the Sub DPS/Support in the team. Raiden Shogun provides Electro attachment for triggering Superconduct in order to maximize Elemental Burst DMG of Eula, and deals DMG on field when Eula is in cooldown.  Raiden Shogun can boost Energy Recharge of their teammates by using Elemental Burst, and also increase DMG of teammates’ Elemental Burst by using Elemental Skill.
Rosaria mainly deals DMG by her Elemental Burst in this build, and acts as a batter of Eula. Rosaria(C6) reduces Physical Resistance of enemies which maximizes Elemental Burst of Eula.
Thoma’s shield provides safe environment for team members.

thoma.name: Thoma Superconduct Team #2
thoma.tier: Thoma is the Support in the team. Thoma’s Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst is maximized by Stacking Max HP and this help to Maximize the team’s survivability.

characters.description: Eula’s Elemental Burst is the core of this team, which is maximized under the effect of Superconduct and Set Bonus of Tenacity of the Millelith from Zhongli.
Fischl’s Elemental Skill can provide continuous Electro DMG even at backstage, which works with Cryo-infused Attacks of Eula to trigger Superconduct.
Chongyun’s Elemental Skill(requires C2) lower CDs of Eula’s Elemental Burst. And He provides Cyro DMG at backstage.
Thoma’s shield provides safe environment for team members.

kujou_sara.name: Kujou Sara Thunder #1 Team
kujou_sara.description: Kujou Sara is a Sub DPS/Support in the team. Kujou Sara(C6) can increase s Electro CRIT DMG Bonus of teammates.

characters.description: Raiden Shogun is the main DPS in the team. The DMG of Elemental Burst depends on the energy consumed by team members using their Elemental Burst. Beidou and Kujou Sara’s Elemental Bursts require 80 energy, which makes them best teammates of Raiden Shogun. Raiden Shogun can boost Energy Recharge of their teammates by using Elemental Burst, and also increase DMG of teammates’ Elemental Burst by using Elemental Skill. This makes Raiden Shogun a all-rounded Main DPS.

Beidou’s Elemental Burst can provide Electro DMG even at backstage. The high energy consumption of Elemental Burst maximizes Elemental Burst DMG of Raiden Shogun.*After Raiden Shogun on live, it was discovered that Raiden Shogun attack during Elemental Burst can’t trigger Beidou’s Elemental Burst.

Kujou Sara can provide ATK Bonus to teammates. And C6 Kujou Sara’s Elemental Burst can boost CRIT DMG of Electro DMG of Raiden Shogun and Beidou. The high energy consumption of Elemental Burst maximizes Elemental Burst DMG of Raiden Shogun.
Bennett’s Elemental Burst provides huge ATK buff and healing to other members.

kujou_sara.name: Kujou Sara Thunder #2 Team

characters.description: Raiden Shogun is the main DPS in the team. The DMG of Elemental Burst of Raiden Shogun is maximized by Kujou Sara(C6)’s Electro CRIT DMG Bonus and Kazuha’s DMG buff/Resistance Reduction.   Raiden Shogun can boost Energy Recharge of their teammates by using Elemental Burst, and also increase DMG of teammates’ Elemental Burst by using Elemental Skill. This makes Raiden Shogun a all-rounded Main DPS.

Kujou Sara can provide ATK Bonus to teammates. And C6 Kujou Sara’s Elemental Burst can boost CRIT DMG of Electro DMG of Raiden Shogun and Beidou. The high energy consumption of Elemental Burst maximizes Elemental Burst DMG of Raiden Shogun.
Kazuha can assist the team by grouping enemies together, applying crowd control, provide DMG buff to teammates and reduce Elemental Resistance of enemies.
Bennett’s Elemental Burst provides huge ATK buff and healing to other members.

The Elemental Burst of Nahida buffs her Elemental Skill depends on the Element of her teammates.  With aid of Raiden Shogun can provide Electro Element, Catalyze can be triggered to maximize team’s DMG.

Kazuha can assist the team by grouping enemies together, applying crowd control, provide DMG buff to teammates and reduce Elemental Resistance of enemies.
Bennett’s Elemental Burst provides huge ATK buff and healing to other members.

lisa.description: Lisa is a Sub DPS in the team. Lisa and Fischl allow the team to trigger Electro-Charged all the time.

characters.description: Kokomi is the Main DPS in the team. The DMG of Elemental Burst depends on the Max HP% of Kokomi. Kokomi can apply the Wet status by using Elemental Skill, and trigger the Electro-Charged DMG. This makes Fischl and Lisa can constantly trigger Electro-Charged in most of the fight time.
Lisa’s Elemental Burst can provide continuous Electro attachment even at backstage, which works with Kokomi to trigger Electro.
Oz can provide continuous Electro attachment even at backstage, which works with Kokomi to trigger Electro Charged.
Kazuha can assist the team by grouping enemies together, applying crowd control, provide DMG buff to teammates and reduce Elemental Resistance of enemies.

keqing.description: Keqing is the Main DPS in the team. The DPS of whole team deals Electro DMG.

characters.description: Keqing mainly uses Heavy Attack to deal DMG. The DMG of Elemental Burst is maximized with the aid of Zhongli and Artifact Set Bonus of Thundersoother.
Beidou’s Elemental Burst can provide Electro DMG even at backstage.
Fischl’s Elemental Skill can provide continuous Electro DMG even at backstage.
Zhongli’s shield provides safe environment for team members, and increase ATK of whole team by using full set of Tenacity of the Millelith.

keqing.name: Keqing Thunder Team #2
keqing.description: Keqing is the Main DPS in the team. The Electro DMG of Keqing is maximized by Kujou Sara(C6)’s Electro CRIT DMG Bonus.

characters.description: Keqing mainly uses Heavy Attack to deal DMG. The DMG of Elemental Burst is maximized with the aid of Kujou Sara(C6) Kazuha and Zhongli.
Kujou Sara can provide ATK Bonus to teammates. And C6 Kujou Sara’s Elemental Burst can boost CRIT DMG of Electro DMG of Keqing.
Kazuha can assist the team by grouping enemies together, applying crowd control, provide DMG buff to teammates and reduce Elemental Resistance of enemies.
Zhongli’s shield provides safe environment for team members, and increase ATK of whole team by using full set of Tenacity of the Millelith.

keqing.name: Keqing Thunder Team #3
keqing.description: Keqing is the Main DPS in the team. Keqing and Raiden Shogun switch to each other when their Elemental Bursts are CD.

characters.description: Keqing mainly uses Heavy Attack to deal DMG. The DMG of Elemental Burst is maximized with the aid of Kazuha and Bennett. Keqing is switched to Raiden Shogun when the Elemntal Burst is CD.

Raiden Shogun is the main DPS in the team. The DMG of Elemental Burst depends on the energy consumed by team members using their Elemental Burst. Raiden Shogun can boost Energy Recharge of their teammates by using Elemental Burst, and also increase DMG of teammates’ Elemental Burst by using Elemental Skill. This makes Raiden Shogun a all-rounded Main DPS. Raiden Shogun is switched to Kequng when the Elemntal Burst is CD.
Kazuha can assist the team by grouping enemies together, applying crowd control, provide DMG buff to teammates and reduce Elemental Resistance of enemies.
Bennett’s Elemental Burst provides huge ATK buff and healing to other members.

keqing.name: Keqing Overload Team
keqing.description: Keqing is the Main DPS in the team. Keqing and Beidou deals Electro DMG which reacts with Pyro attachment from Xiangling to trigger Overload.

characters.description: Keqing mainly uses Heavy Attack to deal DMG. Keqing provides Electro Attachment to trigger Overload.
Beidou’s Elemental Burst can provide Electro DMG even at backstage for trigger Overload.
Xiangling’s Elemental Burst provides huge amount of DMG and continuous Pyro element attachment for Keqing and Beidou to trigger Overload.
Bennett’s Elemental Burst provides huge ATK buff and healing to other members.

keqing.name: Keqing Electro-Charge Team
keqing.description: Keqing is the Main DPS in the team. Keqing and Fischl’s Electro attachment reacts with Hydro attachment from Xingqiu to trigger Electro-Charge.

characters.description: Keqing’s Electro attachment reacts with Hydro attachment from Xingqiu to trigger Electro-Charge.
Fischl can provide continuous Electro attachment even at backstage, which works with Xingqiu to trigger Electro Charged.
Xingqiu’s Elemental Burst can attach Hydro element to enemies continuously, and so react with Keqing and Fischl’s Electro DMG to trigger Electro-Charged.
Bennett’s Elemental Burst provides huge ATK buff and healing to other members.

fischl.name: Keqing Catalyze Team
fischl.description: Fischl is a Sub DPS in the team. The Electro DMG of Traveler (Dendro) is maximized by Catalyzing.

characters.description: Keqing mainly uses multi-stage attacks to trigger the catalyst.Keqing and Fischl activate the elemental resonance effect, which allows the elemental burst of the traveler (Dendro) to be used more speedily
Fischl’s Elemental Skill can provide continuous Electro attachment at backstage, which works with Traveler (Dendro) to trigger Catalyze. C6 of Fischl will have a significant upgrade of the team.
Traveler (Dendro) provides DMG off-field. Traveler (Dendro)’s Dendro DMG is maximized by Catalyzing.
Zhongli’s shield provides safe environment for team members. By using Deepwood Memories Set, enemies Dendro RES is decrease when Zhongli deals Elemental DMG to enemies even when Zhongli is off-field.

fischl.name: Fischl Superconduct Team
fischl.description: Fischl is a Sub DPS in the team. Eula’s Elemental Burst is maximized by Superconduct.

characters.description: Eula’s Elemental Burst is the core of this team, which is maximized under the effect of Superconduct and Set Bonus of Tenacity of the Millelith from Zhongli.
Fischl’s Elemental Skill can provide continuous Electro attachment at backstage, which works with Eula and Chongyun to trigger Superconduct. C6 of Fischl will have a significant upgrade of the team.
Chongyun’s Elemental Skill(requires C2) lower CDs of Eula’s Elemental Burst. And He provides Cryo DMG at backstage.
Zhongli’s shield provides safe environment for team members, and increase ATK of whole team by using full set of Tenacity of the Millelith.

fischl.name: Fischl Overload Team

characters.description: Yoimiya is the main DPS, she provides continuous Pyro attachment to trigger Overload and Vaporization in this team.
Beidou’s Elemental Burst can provide Electro elemental attachment even at backstage, which works with Xingqiu to trigger Electro Charge.
Fischl’s Elemental Skill can provide continuous Electro attachment at backstage, which works with Yoimiya to trigger overload. C6 of Fischl will have a significant upgrade of the team.
Bennett’s Elemental Burst provides huge ATK buff and healing to other members.

fischl.name: Fischl Electro-Charged Team #1

characters.description: Sucrose is a Main DPS in the team. Sucrose(C4) reduces the cooldown of Elemental Skill through her Normal Attack and which can reduce the enemy’s elemental resistance faster.
Oz can provide continuous Electro attachment even at backstage, which works with Xingqiu to trigger Electro Charged.
Beidou’s Elemental Burst can provide Electro elemental attachment even at backstage, which works with Xingqiu to trigger Electro Charge.
Xingqiu’s Elemental Burst can attach Hydro element to enemies continuously, and so react with Beidou and Oz’s Electro DMG to trigger Electro-Charged.

fischl.name: Fischl Electro-Charged Team #2

Beidou’s Elemental Burst can provide Electro DMG even at backstage.
Fischl’s Elemental Skill can provide continuous Electro DMG even at backstage for triggering Electro-Charge.
Jean is a Healer. Jean can assist the team by reduce Elemental Resistance of enemies.

tartaglia.name: Tartaglia Hyberbloom Team
tartaglia.description: Tartaglia is a Main DPS in the team. Dendro Element from Nahida reacts with Hydro Element from Xingqiu to trigger Bloom which produces Dendro Cores. Then Kuki use her Electro element to activate the cores to trigger Hyperbloom.

characters.description: Tartaglia is the main DPS. his continous Hydro attack reacts with the Dendro element on enemies applied by Nahida to trigger Blooming.

Nahida mainly deals DMG by her Elemental Skill, which connects 8 enemies at maximum and deals Dendro DMG to them while triggering elemental reactions. The Elemental Burst of Nahida buffs her Elemental Skill depends on the Element of her teammates.  With aid of Xingqiu which can provide Hydro Element even off-field.As there are two Hydro and one Electro Characters in this team, the duration of her Elemental Burst is increased.
Xingqiu’s Elemental Burst can attach Hydro element to enemies continuously, and so react with Dendro element from Nahida to trigger Blooming which produces cores.

Kuki’s is a Healer And her more important role in this team is to trigger Hyperbloom by using Electro Skill to activate the cores.By maximizing Kuki’s Mastery, the DMG of Hyperbloom becomes significant.

characters.description: Tartaglia is the main DPS, his DMG is amplified by the Vaporization in this team.

characters.description: Raiden Shogun is the main DPS in the team. The DMG of Elemental Burst depends on the energy consumed by team members using their Elemental Burst. Kujou Sara’s Elemental Bursts require 80 energy, which makes them best teammates of Raiden Shogun. Raiden Shogun can boost Energy Recharge of their teammates by using Elemental Burst, and also increase DMG of teammates’ Elemental Burst by using Elemental Skill. This makes Raiden Shogun a all-rounded Main DPS. Raiden Shogun’s Electro DMG reacts with Hydro attachment from Tartaglia to trigger Electro-Charged.

Diona’s shield provides safe environment for team members, and help boost the recharge of Kaeya’s Elemental Burst.
Jean acts as a battery for energy charge of Keqing’s Elemental Burst.

jean.name: Jean Superconduct Team #2
jean.description: Jean is a Healer in the team. Eula’s Elemental Burst is maximized by Superconduct and aid of teammates.

characters.description: Eula’s Elemental Burst is the core of this team, which is maximized under the effect of Superconduct, DMG Bonus from Lisa’s Elemental Brust and Set Bonus of Tenacity of the Millelith from Zhongli.

Raiden Shogun is the Sub DPS/Support in the team. Raiden Shogun provides Electro attachment for triggering Superconduct in order to maximize Elemental Burst DMG of Eula, and deals DMG on field when Eula is in cooldown.  Raiden Shogun can boost Energy Recharge of their teammates by using Elemental Burst, and also increase DMG of teammates’ Elemental Burst by using Elemental Skill.
Rosaria mainly deals DMG by her Elemental Burst in this build, and acts as a batter of Eula. Rosaria(C6) reduces Physical Resistance of enemies which maximizes Elemental Burst of Eula.
Jean is a Healer. Jean can assist the team by reduce Elemental Resistance of enemies.

jean.name: Jean Swirl Team
jean.description: Jean is a Healer/Support in this team. The DMG of Elemental Burst of Xiao is maximized by teammates.

characters.description: Xiao’s Elemental Burst allow Xiao do consecutive Plunge Attack which deals a wide AOE Anemo DMG.

Chongyun’s Elemental Skill(requires C2) lowers CDs of teammates’s Elemental Burst, infuses Kaeya’s Normal Attack with Cryo element and increase Kaeya’s Attack SpeedChongyun’ s Elemental Burst provides Cyro DMG at backstage.
Zhongli’s shield provides safe environment for team members, and increase ATK of whole team by using full set of Tenacity of the Millelith.
Jean is a Healer. Jean can assist the team by reduce Elemental Resistance of enemies.

jean.name: Jean Electro-Charged Team
jean.description: Jean is a Healer in the team. kokomi’s Hydro attack reacts with Electro attachment of Beidou and Fischl to trigger Electro-Charge.

characters.description: Kokomi is the Main DPS in the team. The DMG of Elemental Burst depends on the Max HP% of Kokomi. Kokomi can apply the Wet status by using Elemental Skill, and trigger the Electro-Charged DMG. This makes Fischl and Beidou can constantly trigger Electro-Charged in most of the fight time.
Beidou’s Elemental Burst can provide Electro elemental attachment even at backstage, which works with Kokomi to trigger Electro Charged.
Oz can provide continuous Electro attachment even at backstage, which works with Kokomi to trigger Electro Charged.
Jean is a Healer. Jean can assist the team by reduce Elemental Resistance of enemies.

jean.name: Jean Vaporize Team
jean.description: Jeam is a Healer in the team.The Vapourization DMG of whole team is maximized by Kazuha(C2)’s  Bonus.

characters.description: Diluc is the main DPS, his DMG is amplified by the Vaporization in this team.
Xingqiu’s Elemental Burst can attach Hydro element to enemies continuously, and so react with Diluc’s DMG to trigger Vaporization .
Xiangling’s Elemental Burst provides huge amount of DMG at backstage.
Jean is a Healer. Jean can assist the team by reduce Elemental Resistance of enemies.
